channel.title: Stop Spamming The Wrong Sections! First Time Posters Check This!
channel.description:
I'm sick and tired of it, and I have some friends that are to. Way to many people are posting things here that should be under different sections. People are asking for Server Ip's when they should go to MoparScape Server Advertisement.
Show off what you have done, help with errors and so forth, You Should Go Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,48.0.html For All the files and downloads you need (Example: Cheezscape pk Client) Go Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html For Server Advertisement (Example: Showing off server, or looking for ips) Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,50.0.html For All RS2 server tutorials and codes go here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html To Ask Any Sort Of [u][b]QUESTION[/b][/u] Go Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,87.0.html To talk about your exploits with the 317 client Go Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,91.0.html
The [u][i][b]ONLY[/b][/i][/u] reason you should use this section of the forums is to show off what you have done, help with errors and so forth, as stated in the homepage.
I hope this helps some of you first time posters.

item.title: Stop Spamming The Wrong Sections! First Time Posters Check This!
item.dc:creator: @boomer216 boomer216
item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

Wait, This A Guide On How Not To Spam… Written By You… And Yet… For Some Odd Reason… I Feel That THIS Is Spam…

The ONLY reason you should use this section of the forums is to show off what you have done, help with errors and so forth, as stated in the homepage.

Ok You DON’T “Show Off” What you did in this section, you help people…

Don’t Just Copy And Paste The Same Thing In Every Section.

And Stop Being A Suck-Up, That Don’t Get You Mod Status Here

Read full topic
item.source: Stop Spamming The Wrong Sections! First Time Posters Check This!
